mapper.insert: insert into lecture_table(lecture_name, lecture_movie1, lecture_movie2, lecture_movie3, lecture_movie4, lecture_movie5, lecture_movie6, lecture_movie7, lecture_movie8, lecture_movie9, lecture_movie10) values(#{lecture_name}, #{lecture_movie1}, #{lecture_movie2}, #{lecture_movie3}, #{lecture_movie4}, #{lecture_movie5}, #{lecture_movie6}, #{lecture_movie7}, #{lecture_movie8}, #{lecture_movie9}, #{lecture_movie10});
